original_title: Sleepless Nights: Revisiting the Slumber Party Massacres
overview: 30 years after the original feminist slasher film The Slumber Party Massacre (1982) hit theaters, cast & crew revisit the scene of the crime and its sequels.
tagline: The Parties Began When The Light Went Out...
title: Sleepless Nights: Revisiting the Slumber Party Massacres
